title: Getatchew Mekurya - Negus Of Ethiopian Sax (Ethiopiques Vol.14)

This ethiopian jazz album was recorded in 1970 and originally released in Ethiopia in 1972.
It has been re-issued in 2003 as part of the Ethiopiques series of the french label Buda Musique.
